data.title: Oklahoma City Thunder live scores & schedule
data.meta_description: Oklahoma City Thunder live score, schedule, standings and results. Check out the current Oklahoma City Thunder roster and dive into player statistics.
data.text:
Oklahoma City Thunder live score, standings, schedule and results from all basketball tournaments that Oklahoma City Thunder played.

Oklahoma City Thunder next match

Oklahoma City Thunder will play the next match on Jul 20, 2024, 2:30:00 AM UTC against Golden State Warriors in NBA Summer League.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Oklahoma City Thunder vs Golden State Warriors live score, updated point-by-point.

We may have video highlights with points and news for some Oklahoma City Thunder games, but only if they play their game in one of the most popular basketball leagues.

Statistics and standings are updated at the end of the game.

Oklahoma City Thunder previous game

Oklahoma City Thunder previous game was against Phoenix Suns in NBA Summer League, game ended with result 99 - 100 (Phoenix Suns won the game).

Oklahoma City Thunder matches tab is showing the last 100 basketball games with statistics and win/lose icons.

There are also all Oklahoma City Thunder scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Current Oklahoma City Thunder players

The current Oklahoma City Thunder roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

Guard: Alex Caruso, Luguentz Dort, Isaiah Joe, Aaron Wiggins, Cason Wallace, Ajay Mitchell, Jack Gohlke, Dillon Jones, Adam Flagler, Buddy Boeheim, Cormac Ryan, Jaden Shackelford, Hunter Maldonado, Jaykwon Walton Guard-Forward: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, Jalen Williams, Kenrich Williams, Alex Ducas Forward-Center: Chet Holmgren Center-Forward: Isaiah Hartenstein Center: Tre Mitchell, KJ Williams, Kylor Kelley

Oklahoma City Thunder performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Oklahoma City Thunder games.
